data.name: Tabletop Warriors
data.detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

Coming 2022


About the Game

A lonely Mystic got tired of playing board games alone - what better solution than to bring the figurines to life in VR! Play as the Mystic (the game master) or one of the dungeon crawling Warriors, taking on quests using classic RPG elements to battle enemies and discover surprises along the way.

Meet up with friends to go on a role-playing adventure together to complete quests while battling enemies and overcoming challenges.

  • Select from an inventory of pre-written quests
  • Utilize your character’s unique weapons, spells, and actions to join forces and beat the omnipresent game master
  • Select from either the Wizard or Sorceress as the game master
  • Select from one of the Warrior figurines come-to-life (Fighter, Thief, Cleric, Mage, Dwarf, Elf)

Tabletop Warriors is optimized for 3-5 players in private groups in VR to share an immersive adventure with trusted friends. This game is available in VR only using the Oculus Rift headsets.

data.short_description: Tabletop Warriors is an immersive, social VR experience in the tradition of a tabletop dungeon crawling adventure. Players transform into figurines on the table solving quests under the ever watchful eye of the game master.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8GB+ RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
